name: Anime Champ
overview:
Anime Champ is a multi-game arcade machine released as part of the Bishi Bashi series. It is an anime-themed quiz variant, featuring 5 (relatively obscure) anime series: Himitsu no Akko-chan, Ikkyū-san, Mahō Tsukai Sally, GeGeGe no Kitaro and Ōkami Shōnen Ken.

The game play revolves around the three button configuration: players will face challenges that require quick response times, color correspondence and left/right and middle maneuvering.
